catalog_1_high_fidelity.desc: Maximum texture preservation, subtle improvements only
catalog_1_high_fidelity.prompt: professional e-commerce product photography, wrinkle-free garment, clean pressed fabric, studio lighting, white background, preserve original texture and color
catalog_1_high_fidelity.negative_prompt: wrinkles, creases, folds, shadows, uneven lighting, distorted, background clutter

catalog_2_balanced.prompt: professional catalog photography, smooth wrinkle-free garment, perfectly pressed, even studio lighting, white seamless background, preserve fabric texture and original color
catalog_2_balanced.negative_prompt: wrinkles, creases, folds, harsh shadows, uneven lighting, color shift, texture loss, distortion

catalog_3_strong_correction.prompt: professional e-commerce catalog photo, perfectly smooth wrinkle-free garment, flat pressed fabric, uniform studio lighting, pure white background, maintain fabric texture
catalog_3_strong_correction.negative_prompt: wrinkles, creases, folds, rumpled fabric, shadows, uneven lighting, color change, texture degradation

catalog_4_texture_priority.prompt: e-commerce product photo, wrinkle-free, studio lighting, white background, exact original texture and color preserved, natural fabric appearance
catalog_4_texture_priority.negative_prompt: wrinkles, folds, shadows, texture change, color shift, artificial look

catalog_5_high_quality.prompt: high-end professional catalog photography, immaculately pressed wrinkle-free garment, perfect studio lighting, pure white background, preserve exact fabric texture and color
catalog_5_high_quality.negative_prompt: wrinkles, creases, folds, harsh shadows, color variation, texture loss, uneven lighting, background elements

catalog_6_subtle_enhancement.desc: Very subtle changes, almost identical to input
catalog_6_subtle_enhancement.prompt: clean product photo, smooth fabric, even lighting, white background, preserve original appearance

catalog_7_aggressive_perfection.desc: Maximum perfection, may sacrifice some texture
catalog_7_aggressive_perfection.prompt: flawless professional catalog photography, perfectly smooth wrinkle-free garment, pristine pressed fabric, perfect studio lighting, pure white seamless background
catalog_7_aggressive_perfection.negative_prompt: any wrinkles, creases, folds, imperfections, shadows, texture artifacts, color inconsistency, uneven lighting

catalog_8_color_accurate.desc: Focus on color accuracy and texture
catalog_8_color_accurate.prompt: professional product photography, wrinkle-free, studio lighting, white background, exact color match to original, faithful texture reproduction, color-accurate
catalog_8_color_accurate.negative_prompt: wrinkles, color shift, hue change, saturation change, texture alteration, shadows
